name: boken2-rpg
description: An RPG engine where you can travel around, interact with NPCs, and create worlds with words.

scripts.build: npm run-script clean && npm run-script populate-dist && webpack --progress --profile --colors --mode=production && echo app built, look in the ./dist folder
scripts.serve: npm run-script clean && npm run-script populate-dist && webpack --progress --profile --colors --mode=development && http-server -c-1 -p 8082 ./dist
scripts.populate-dist: copyfiles -E index.html dist/ && copyfiles -Eu 0 assets/**/* dist/

author: Daniel Oakley <daniel@danieloaks.net>
